title: Their parents are in disgrace, what now for Princesses Beatrice and Eugenie?
description: The princesses will need to step out from their parents' shadow if they are to be an active part of the Royal Family.
content:
After a bruising week, it's hard to overstate the mess that Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor and Sarah Ferguson find themselves in.
But increasingly it appears it's a mess their daughters also can't escape.
The newly released emails indicate that Jeffrey E... [8722 chars]

title: Storm Leonardo forces more than 11,000 in Spain and Portugal to evacuate their homes
description: A man aged about 70 died in Portugal after his car was swept away. And on Friday, police said a second body was found in Malaga.
content:
A 'storm train' of consecutive winds and rains battering Spain and Portugal has already forced 11,000 people to flee their homes.
A man, believed to be about 70, died in Portugal's southern Alentejo region on Wednesday after his car was swept away by... [1856 chars]

title: I inhaled traffic fumes to find out where air pollution goes in my body
description: BBC health correspondent James Gallagher gets his blood analysed to understand how air pollution is killing us.
content:
I feel contaminated.
I'm in a laboratory staring at my blood under a microscope. Rather than pristine red blood cells, some of them have been tainted with black markings. I'm now one of the first people in the world to see air pollution building up i... [5815 chars]

title: What was Jeffrey Epstein's connection to Northern Ireland?
description: Millions of files released this week shed fresh light on the links between Jeffrey Epstein and prominent political and public figures.
content:
Millions of files released this week shed fresh light on the links between late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein and his relationships with prominent political and public figures around the world.

title: Martin Lewis has warned against overpaying student loans
description: Campaigners have criticised the terms of loans that were issued in England and still exist in Wales.
content:
Luke England recently became a father, and he's already thinking about setting up a university fund for his new baby.
But first he wants to try to clear his own student debt - by repaying £75 on top of the £250 that already comes out of his pay chequ... [7149 chars]
